Customs (Amendment) Act, No. 23 of 1968 L, D.—0. 18/67. AN Act To AMEND THE Customs OnpINaNce. (Date of Assent: June 16, 1968] BE it enacted by the Queen’s Most Excellent Majesty, by and with the edviee and consent of the Senate and ‘House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parliament assembled, and by tha authority of the same, ag follows :—
4. This Act may be cited as the Customs (Amend- Stor ule ment) Act, No. 23 of 1968,

. of the general revenue of Ceylon; and (®) the other half into fund under the control of such Collector for distribution in his absolute dis- cretion among the officers con- cerned and the informers.”.
